ğŸŒŸ Rating: 4.5/5 ğŸ” Summary

The Alchemist follows Santiago, a young shepherd from Spain, who dreams of discovering a hidden treasure in Egypt. Along his journey, he meets a gypsy fortune teller, a king, and an alchemist, each guiding him toward his Personal Legendâ€”his true purpose in life. Through trials, love, and self-discovery, Santiago learns that “when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.”
